name: Bees vs. Ants
summary:
The bees' territory was invaded by the ants. On this vital moment, the bees took up arms bravely to teach the shameless invadors.
Dear Commander, please lead the brave bees to expel the abhorrent ants!
Bees vs. Ants has 60 challenging levels,and features hours of gameplay.
Main goal of Bees vs. Ants is to occupy all castles and towers. The control is simple. You just play this game with finger swipes.
